sections.title: Welcome to DriveAutoWorld
sections.subtitle: Your Premier Destination for New and Used Cars
sections.name: HeroSection
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Discover the car of your dreams at DriveAutoWorld. Explore our extensive inventory, enjoy outstanding customer service, and drive away in the perfect vehicle today.

images.name: HeroImage_MainCars
images.description: Exciting display of various car models in the showroom.

sections.title: About Us
sections.name: AboutSection
sections.label: About
sections.content: At DriveAutoWorld, we pride ourselves on offering a wide selection of new and pre-owned vehicles. Our mission is to connect our customers with their perfect car while providing exceptional service and support. Discover why our commitment to quality and community sets us apart from the rest.

images.name: Showroom_Interior
images.description: A welcoming and modern car dealership showroom interior.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: Quality Services for Your Automotive Needs
sections.name: ServicesSection
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
### Wide Selection of Cars  
Explore our diverse inventory of new and used cars to find the perfect fit for your lifestyle.

### Financing Options  
We offer flexible financing solutions tailored to meet your budget.

### Vehicle Trade-In  
Upgrade your ride with ease through our seamless trade-in services.

### After-Sales Support  
Benefit from our comprehensive maintenance and repair services, keeping your vehicle in top condition.

images.name: CarShowroom_Display
images.description: Display of various car models from sedans to SUVs.

sections.title: See Our Cars in Action
sections.subtitle: A Glimpse into Our Quality Range
sections.name: GallerySection
sections.label: Gallery
sections.content: Explore our gallery showcasing a variety of vehicle models, each featuring sleek designs and state-of-the-art technology.

sections.title: Customer Testimonials
sections.subtitle: Hear From Our Satisfied Customers

sections.label: Testimonials
sections.content:

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.subtitle: We're Here to Help You Find Your Next Car
sections.name: ContactSection
sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
### Get in Touch
Whether you're looking for a new car or need assistance with financing options, our team is here to help you. 

- **Phone**: (123) 456-7890  
- **Email**: contact@driveautoworld.com  
- **Address**: 1234 Car Lane, Anytown, AT 12345  

Visit our dealership to test drive your dream car today!
